posts.content:
Hi all.

I am newly registered to this forum but have known it for ages and always on it.

I am maybe selling my 67 Split window panel van. It is 99.9% Complete (just missing mirrors and 1 wiper arm).
It is also running but there is either a problem with the drag link or tie-rods.
There is very minimal Rust and the body is still solid, it is mostly surface rust.
It has original 1500 Engine, that still sounds good.
Only major problem is that the Nose was damaged and fixed by preivous ownwer.

Pics attached. Only reason for selling is that I might have a crew cab that I want to do up. Panel van is in South Africa.
If you want to restore it, it will be easy to do. If you require any more info Please let me know.

Looking at R40000(ZAR) or 3500 Pounds.
kuven0107@gmail.com
